attacks.name: Psychic Club
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each of your Benched Psychic Pokémon.

attacks.name: Cross Division GX
attacks.effect: Put 10 damage counters on your opponent’s Pokémon in any way you like. If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack’s cost), put 20 damage counters on them instead. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
